summary.span: 表示一个对象缓存并提供用于访问该对象缓存的基方法和属性。

span.span: Represents an object cache and provides the base methods and properties for accessing the object cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类型是内存中对象缓存的主类型。The type is the primary type for the in-memory object cache. 若要开发自定义缓存实现，派生从类。To develop a custom cache implementation, you derive from the class. > [!NOTE] > 类是在新[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。The class is new as of the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 内置类派生自类。The built-in class derives from the class. 类是中的唯一具体对象缓存实现[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]派生类。The class is the only concrete object cache implementation in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] that derives from the class.

span.span: This type is thread safe.

para.span: 因为类型表示仅常见的缓存功能，了解如何无必须实例化并获取实例。

span.span: Because the type represents only common cache functions, there is no requirement for how an instance must be instantiated and obtained.

para.span: 此外，还有的具体实现不要求类必须是单一实例。

span.span: In addition, there is no requirement that concrete implementations of the class must be singletons.

para.span: 不是单一实例，但您应创建仅几个或者可能仅一个实例和缓存项的代码应使用这些实例。

span.span: is not a singleton, but you should create only a few or potentially only one instance and code that caches items should use those instances.

para.span: 继承自类，必须重写其方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, you must override its methods.

MemberSignature.Value: protected ObjectCache ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: ObjectCache();

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 从派生类中的构造函数进行调用以便初始化 类。

span.span: Called from constructors in derived classes in order to initialize the class.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，向缓存中插入缓存项，而无需返回具有匹配键的现有缓存项。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, inserts a cache entry into the cache, without requiring that an existing cache entry with a matching key be returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重载尝试将某个缓存项插入缓存中，而无需覆盖或删除具有相同键的现有缓存项。The method overloads try to insert a cache entry into the cache, without overwriting or removing an existing cache entry that has the same key. 缓存项可以是类型化对象或泛型对象。The cache entry can be a typed object or a generic object. 方法重载和方法重载具有一个重要的差异。The method overloads and the method overloads have one significant difference. 这些方法插入缓存项时，如果在缓存中，找到一个匹配项，则当方法重载将返回现有的缓存项，但方法重载不这样做。When these methods insert a cache entry, if a matching entry is found in the cache, the method overloads return the existing cache entry, but the method overloads do not. 具有这些不同的方法重载使调用方能够优化其基于它们是否需要现有的缓存项的代码。Having these different method overloads enables callers to optimize their code based on whether they need the existing cache entry. 在分布式缓存中，通过使用返回的现有值方法可能比使用返回一个布尔值开销更大方法。In distributed caches, returning an existing value by using the method might be more expensive than returning a Boolean value by using method.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool Add (System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem item, System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy policy);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Add(class System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem item, class System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy policy) cil managed
Public Overridable Function Add (item As CacheItem, policy As CacheItemPolicy) As Boolean
public: virtual bool Add(System::Runtime::Caching::CacheItem ^ item, System::Runtime::Caching::CacheItemPolicy ^ policy);

abstract member Add : System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem * System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy -> bool override this.Add : System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItem * System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy -> bool

param.name: item
param.span: 要添加的对象。

span.span: The object to add.

param.name: policy
param.span: 一个包含该缓存项的逐出详细信息的对象。

span.span: An object that contains eviction details for the cache entry.

param.span: 此对象提供比简单绝对过期更多的逐出选项。

span.span: This object provides more options for eviction than a simple absolute expiration.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，尝试以 实例的形式将缓存项插入缓存中，并添加有关应如何逐出该项的详细信息。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, tries to insert a cache entry into the cache as a instance, and adds details about how the entry should be evicted.

returns.span: 如果插入成功，则为 ；如果缓存中已存在具有与 相同的键的项，则为 。

span.span: if insertion succeeded, or if there is an already an entry in the cache that has the same key as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重载是虚拟 （不是抽象的） 上类，因为方法在内部调用。The method overloads are virtual (not abstract) on the class, because the method internally calls . 这样可以减少缓存实施者必须提供的方法重载。This reduces the number of method overloads that a cache implementer has to provide. 如果缓存实现不需要任何特殊行为方法，它可实现方法重载。If a cache implementation does not require any special behavior for the method, it can just implement the method overloads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重载是虚拟 （不是抽象的） 上类，因为方法在内部调用。The method overloads are virtual (not abstract) on the class, because the method internally calls . 这样可以减少缓存实施者必须提供的方法重载。This reduces the number of method overloads that a cache implementer has to provide. 如果缓存实现不需要任何特殊行为方法，它可实现方法重载。If a cache implementation does not require any special behavior for the method, it can just implement the method overloads.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，尝试向缓存中插入缓存项，并返回具有匹配键的现有缓存项。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, tries to insert a cache entry into the cache, and returns an existing cache entry with a matching key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重载将项插入到缓存。The method overloads insert an entry into the cache. 如果已存在具有匹配键的缓存项，它们将返回现有条目。If a cache entry with a matching key already exists, they return the existing entry. 缓存项可以是对象或泛型对象。The cache entry can be a object or a generic object. 之间的一个区别重载和重载。There is one difference between the overloads and the overloads. 这些重载的方法尝试插入缓存项时，如果找到一个现有项，具有匹配的现有密钥插入缓存项时重载将返回现有的缓存项。When these overloaded methods try to insert a cache entry, if an existing entry is found that has a key that matches an existing inserted cache entry, the overloads return the existing cache entry. 重载不这样做。The overloads do not.

Public MustOverride Function CreateCacheEntryChangeMonitor (keys As IEnumerable(Of String), Optional regionName As String = null) As CacheEntryChangeMonitor
abstract member CreateCacheEntryChangeMonitor : seq<string> * string -> System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryChangeMonitor

param.name: keys
param.span: 要监视的缓存项的唯一标识符。

span.span: The unique identifiers for cache entries to monitor.

param.name: regionName
param.span: 可选。

span.span: Optional.

param.span: 缓存中包含 key 参数中的缓存键的命名区域（如果实现了区域）。

span.span: A named region in the cache where the cache keys in the keys parameter exist, if regions are implemented.

param.span: 可选参数的默认值为 。

span.span: The default value for the optional parameter is .

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，创建一个 对象，该对象可触发事件以响应对指定缓存项的更改。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates a object that can trigger events in response to changes to specified cache entries.

returns.span: 用于监视缓存中的缓存项的更改监视器。

span.span: A change monitor that monitors cache entries in the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当派生类重写基方法，必须创建的缓存实现对象。When a derived class overrides the base method, the cache implementation must create a object. 此专用的更改监视器中指定的缓存项的更改时通知调用方`keys`参数。This specialized change monitor notifies callers when there are changes to the cache entries that are specified in the `keys` parameter. 例如，如果在受监视项目`keys`更新或从缓存中删除参数，则此方法创建的更改监视器触发事件。For example, if a monitored item in the `keys` parameter is updated or removed from the cache, the change monitor created by this method triggers an event. 如果缓存实现支持命名的缓存区域，可以将一个字符串值指定为`regionName`参数。If a cache implementation supports named cache regions, a string value can be specified as the `regionName` parameter. 否则，该参数默认为`null`。Otherwise, the parameter defaults to `null`. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有的缓存实现都支持缓存项的更改监视器。Not all cache implementations support cache-entry change monitors. 若要确定是否支持您的缓存实现对象，请参阅特定缓存实现的文档。To determine whether your cache implementation supports objects, see the documentation for the specific cache implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重载存在是因为某些缓存实现可能会延长类。This method overload exists because some cache implementations might extend the class. 在这种情况下，方法重载将不一定返回有关缓存的数据的所有信息。In that case, the method overload will not necessarily return all the information about cached data. 但是，方法重载使自定义缓存以返回多个只是缓存值。However, the method overload enables custom caches to return more than just the cache value. 方法就像方法，不同之处在于方法返回作为该缓存项返回实例。The method is like the method, except that the method returns return the cache entry as a instance.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，创建可用于循环访问缓存项的集合的枚举器。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates an enumerator that can be used to iterate through a collection of cache entries.

returns.span: 可提供对缓存中的缓存项进行访问的枚举器对象。

span.span: The enumerator object that provides access to the cache entries in the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存实施者可以重写和扩展此方法以提供自定义方法来循环访问缓存项的集合。Cache implementers can override and extend this method to provide a custom means of iterating through a collection of cache entries. > [!NOTE] > 返回一个枚举器通常是比返回整个缓存条目的开销更大的操作。Returning an enumerator is typically a more expensive operation than returning the entire cache entry. 显式接口实现调用此方法的类具有用于和方法。This method is called by the explicit interface implementations that the class has for the and methods.

summary.span: 获取一组缓存项。

span.span: Gets a set of cache entries.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取与指定键对应的一组缓存项。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a set of cache entries that correspond to the specified keys.

returns.span: 一个表示缓存项的键/值对字典。

span.span: A dictionary of key/value pairs that represent cache entries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重载是一种性能优化的分布式缓存，支持在单个网络调用期间从缓存提取多个缓存项。The method overload is a performance optimization for distributed caches that support fetching multiple cache entries from the cache during a single network call. 尽管调用方可以将一个或多个密钥传递给方法，则所有键都表示缓存中的项无法保证。Although a caller can pass one or more keys to the method, there is no guarantee that all keys represent entries in the cache. 因此，返回的字典可能包含比向方法传递的键的数目较少的项。Therefore, the returned dictionary might contain fewer items than the number of keys that were passed to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重载就像方法重载，但允许使用可选参数语法支持的 C# 等托管语言传入命名的区域。The method overload is like the method overload, but lets you pass the named region by using optional parameter syntax that is supported by managed languages such as C#. 此方法是一个虚拟方法，因为类提供了一个默认实现，传递`params`数组到方法重载。This method is a virtual method because the class provides a default implementation that passes the `params` array to the method overload.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置对托管宿主环境的引用，该环境对 实现可用并且可以为 实现提供特定于宿主的服务。

span.span: Gets or set a reference to a managed hosting environment that is available to implementations and that can provide host-specific services to implementations.

value.span: 对缓存识别托管宿主环境的引用。

span.span: A reference to a cache-aware managed hosting environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性应以供[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]托管环境并实现依赖于.NET Framework 的行为的缓存实现托管环境。The property is intended for use by [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] host environments and by cache implementations that implement behavior that depends on the .NET Framework host environment. 下表列出了主机环境服务的可能是可从托管宿主环境，适用于套实现通过属性：The following table lists the set of host environment services that might be available from a managed hosting environment and that are available to implementations through the property: |服务Service|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||允许宿主环境提供所需的功能，例如标识性能计数器的缓存实现的应用程序域标识符。Lets host environments provide application domain identifiers that might be needed by a cache implementation for features such as identifying performance counters.| ||允许宿主环境提供的自定义的文件更改通知系统，而不是使用中提供[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。Lets host environments provide a custom file-change notification system, instead of using the one provided in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].| ||可让缓存实现将缓存内存消耗报告给主机环境。Lets cache implementations report cache memory consumption to the host environment. 这使宿主环境可以跨多个缓存实现集中管理内存使用情况。This enables host environments to centrally manage memory consumption across multiple cache implementations.| > [!NOTE] > 此属性的值的调用方要求不受限制的代码访问安全性权限。Callers of this property value require unrestricted code access security permissions.

span.span: The value being assigned to the property is .

exception.span: 已尝试多次设置该属性值。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property value more than one time.

permission.span: 为此属性的所有访问器的完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for all accessors of this property.

permission.span: 不能由部分受信任的代码使用此属性。

span.span: This property cannot be used by partially trusted code.

Public Shared ReadOnly InfiniteAbsoluteExpiration As DateTimeOffset

staticval mutable InfiniteAbsoluteExpiration : DateTimeOffset

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示某个缓存项没有绝对过期。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates that a cache entry has no absolute expiration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 插入到缓存与某个缓存项字段值设置为永不过期的过期值应该基于绝对点中的时间。A cache entry that is inserted into the cache with the field value set as the expiration value should never expire based on an absolute point in time. 但是，具有此设置的缓存项可以是从缓存中逐出的其他原因，由特定缓存实现，如内存压力导致更改监视器事件逐出。However, a cache entry with this setting can be evicted from the cache for other reasons that are determined by a particular cache implementation, such as a change-monitor event eviction caused by memory pressure.

span.span: Gets or sets the default indexer for the class.

value.span: 用作该缓存实例的索引器的键。

span.span: A key that serves as an indexer into the cache instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的 set 访问器的行为就像方法。The behavior of the set accessor of this property is like the method. 在内部，缓存实现可以设置到指定的值的绝对过期方法。Internally, a cache implementation could set the absolute expiration of the specified value to the method. 但是此行为是最终取决于缓存实现。However this behavior is ultimately up to the cache implementation. Get 访问器的行为就像调用方法，并使用`null`区域名称。The behavior of get accessor is like calling the method and using `null` for the region name.

summary.span: 获取某个特定 实例的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of a specific instance.

value.span: 某个特定缓存实例的名称。

span.span: The name of a specific cache instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些缓存实现可能支持在单个应用程序中运行的缓存的多个实例。Some cache implementations might support multiple instances of the cache that is running in a single application. 此属性允许缓存实施者返回用于标识某个特定缓存实例的名称。This property lets cache implementers return a name that identifies a specific cache instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly TimeSpan NoSlidingExpiration;
.field public static initonly valuetype System.TimeSpan NoSlidingExpiration
Public Shared ReadOnly NoSlidingExpiration As TimeSpan
public: static initonly TimeSpan NoSlidingExpiration;
staticval mutable NoSlidingExpiration : TimeSpan

summary.span: 指示某个缓存项没有可调过期时间。

span.span: Indicates that a cache entry has no sliding expiration time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基于持续时间或定义的时间窗口过期也被称为可调过期。Expiration that is based on duration or a defined window of time is also referred to as sliding expiration. 通常情况下，逐出基于可调过期的项的缓存实现将删除在指定的时间段未被访问的项。Normally, a cache implementation that evicts items that are based on sliding expiration will remove an item that has not been accessed in the specified window of time. 插入到缓存与某个缓存项字段值设置为过期值应该永远不会收回由于非活动的滑动时间窗口中。A cache entry that is inserted into the cache with the field value set as the expiration value should never be evicted because of non-activity in a sliding time window. 但是，如果具有绝对到期，或某些其他逐出事件发生时，此类更改监视器或内存压力，可以逐出缓存项。However, a cache item can be evicted if it has an absolute expiration, or if some other eviction event occurs, such a change monitor or memory pressure.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，从缓存中移除缓存项。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, removes the cache entry from the cache.

returns.span: 一个对象，表示由该键指定的已移除缓存项的值；如果找不到指定的项，则为 。

span.span: An object that represents the value of the removed cache entry that was specified by the key, or if the specified entry was not found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您重写此方法在自定义缓存实现中，如果对应于在缓存中没有某个缓存项`key`，应返回已移除的项的值。If you override this method in a custom cache implementation, if there is a cache entry in the cache that corresponds to `key`, the value of the removed item should be returned. 如果不从缓存中删除，该方法应返回`null`。If nothing was removed from the cache, the method should return `null`. > [!NOTE] > 某些分布式的缓存实现可能不支持的功能，以返回已从缓存中删除的值。Some distributed cache implementations might not support the ability to return the value that was removed from the cache. 这可能是因为缓存实现不支持返回已移除的缓存项的值。This might be because the cache implementation does not support returning the value of a removed cache item. 它还可能是因为将对象封送，因为返回值是过于昂贵。It might also be because marshaling the object as a return value is too expensive. 在这种情况下，缓存实现可以返回`null`。In such cases, cache implementations can return `null`.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，向缓存中插入缓存项。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, inserts a cache entry into the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 典型行为重载的方法是插入或更新操作。The typical behavior of the overload methods is an insert-or-update operation. 某个缓存项是可以为新项插入如果指定的项不存在，或用新值更新的缓存项，如果它已存在。A cache entry is either inserted as a new entry if the specified entry does not exist, or the cache entry is updated with a new value if it already exists.

param.name: item
param.span: 要添加的缓存项。

span.span: The cache item to add.

param.name: policy
param.span: 一个包含该缓存项的逐出详细信息的对象。

span.span: An object that contains eviction details for the cache entry.

param.span: 此对象提供比简单绝对过期更多的逐出选项。

span.span: This object provides more options for eviction than a simple absolute expiration.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，以 实例的形式向缓存中插入缓存项，同时指定有关如何逐出该项的信息。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, inserts the cache entry into the cache as a instance, specifying information about how the entry will be evicted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果为密钥`item`不存在，`item`作为新的缓存项插入。If the key for `item` does not exist, `item` is inserted as a new cache entry. 如果具有匹配键的项`item`存在，将值从`item`用于更新或覆盖现有的缓存项的值。If an item with a key that matches `item` exists, the value from `item` is used to update or overwrite the value of the existing cache entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果匹配的项`key`不在缓存中，存在`value`和`key`用于为新的缓存项插入。If an item that matches `key` does not exist in the cache, `value` and `key` are used to insert as a new cache entry. 如果具有匹配键的项`item`存在，更新或使用覆盖缓存项`value`。If an item with a key that matches `item` exists, the cache entry is updated or overwritten by using `value`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的重载，可提供比基于时间的绝对过期中提供的更多逐出或过期详细信息。This method overload lets you provide more eviction or expiration details than those that are available in time-based absolute expiration. 如果匹配的项`key`不在缓存中，存在`value`和`key`用于为新的缓存项插入。If an item that matches `key` does not exist in the cache, `value` and `key` are used to insert as a new cache entry. 如果具有匹配键的项`item`存在，更新或使用覆盖缓存项`value`。If an item with a key that matches `item` exists, the cache entry is updated or overwritten by using `value`.

returns.span: 可提供对缓存中的项的访问的枚举器对象。

span.span: The enumerator object that provides access to the items in the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 仅当派生时，可以使用它实例转换为接口。It can be used only when a derived instance is cast to an interface. 开发人员可以使用此方法循环访问缓存项的泛型集合。Developers can use this method to iterate through a generic collection of cache entries. 这是默认值实现，它在内部调用方法。This is the default implementation that internally calls the method.
